## Quarto and R Markdown

Quarto is relatively new and some things might still be more convenient with R Markdown...

- [papaja](https://github.com/crsh/papaja): manuscripts formatted in APA style
- [learnr](https://github.com/rstudio/learnr): interactive tutorials
- [vitae](https://github.com/mitchelloharawild/vitae): academic CVs
- [posterdown](https://github.com/brentthorne/posterdown): conference posters
- [flexdashboard](https://pkgs.rstudio.com/flexdashboard/): flexible dashboards
